item.title: Friday’s big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: The S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite crept higher on Thursday to post fresh record closes. Here's what's on CNBC's radar going into Friday.

item.title: This original tech bellwether is trouncing the market in 2025 — and pays a solid dividend
item.description: Traders punished IBM on Thursday after software revenue came in short of Wall Street's expectations, but there could be a silver lining for long-term ...

item.title: Sydney Sweeney sparks latest meme stock rally as American Eagle jumps
item.description: GoPro, Krispy Kreme, Opendoor Technologies and Kohl's have all drawn attention from meme stock traders this week.

item.title: Birkenstock gets an upgrade to buy from Goldman Sachs
item.description: Birkenstock shares are trading at an "attractive entry point," analyst Louise Singlehurst said.

item.title: Alphabet signals ‘AI arms race’ is alive and well, analysts say
item.description: Alphabet's investments in artificial intelligence could be a positive sign for the AI trade if its peers echo similar bullish sentiment, UBS said.
